DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial web-based informational intervention ( UMFollowUp ) adolescent young adult survivor childhood cancer improve cancer knowledge psychosocial functioning .
DOC.brief_title: Empowering Cancer Survivors Through Information Technology
DOC.detailed_description: Individuals randomly assign control group receive standard care duration participation . This mean continue receive information regard diagnosis , treatment ongoing health need provider ( access website ) . Individuals randomly assign treatment group receive access UMFollowUp , secure , HIPAA-compliant website . All participant ask complete paper-and-pencil survey baseline 9 month later determine impact web-based intervention .
DOC.criteria: History diagnosis hematologic malignancy malignant neoplasm , disease free remission time recruitment . Must Englishspeaking access computer internet access , must complete treatment University Minnesota Medical CenterFairview cancer . Individual significant visual impairment neurologic/cognitive difficulty limit ability see outcome questionnaire website content exclude participation .
